title: Halpppp
body: IM trying to find some people like a group to normally play with, I'm a 13 year old boy and id like to have a group, I'm a little mature for my age so don't feel like anything is to much. id just like some people to talk to on Skype or something. i can act childish sometimes but i promise I'm not toxic or mean >.<

replies.body: _''m a little mature for my age'_ **  =** _'Halpppp'_
